m_szDocTitle: First 3-D Printed Electric Vehicle for Chicago Tech Show | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: First 3-D Printed Electric Vehicle for Chicago Tech Show February 26th, 2014 by Jake Richardson   The International Manufacturing Technology Show in September of 2014 will feature a direct digital manufactured vehicle. It will not be an  electric version of the Rally Fighter, one of the first vehicles created and made by Local Motors, but instead a vehicle built specifically for the Chicago driving environment. Making a digitally manufactured electric vehicle is a great way to demonstrate the production capability of the Local Motors process, “To deliver the first co-created, locally relevant,
